documentation.text: @dev mapping that stores the service level objectives created by a user

attributes.text: @dev mapping that stores the service level objectives created by a user

devdoc.details: SLORegistry is a contract for handling creation of service level objectives and querying those service level objectives

SLOCreated(address,address).details: event for service level objective creation logging

params.slo: 1.  the address of the created service level objective contract

createSLO(uint256,uint8,bytes32).details: public function for creating service level objectives

params._name: 3. name of the service level objective in bytes32

userSLOs(address).details: public view function that returns the service level objectives that the given user has created

params._user: Address of the user for which to return the service level objectives

returns._0: SLO an array of service level objectives that corresponds to the _user params

registeredSLOs.details: mapping to check the registered SLOs

userToSLOs.details: mapping that stores the service level objectives created by a user

devdoc.title: SLORegistry
